segments.text: The kitchen looks bright with day light from the open window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Garden outside is tidy, bushes and path so serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the woman polishes her plate diligently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet's on, sink full, water spilling over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle growing at her feetâ€”she doesn't see it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could cause a big slip-up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's climbing the stool to the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookie jar's right there, he's grabbing handfuls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl reaches for her share, eyes wide.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking rules, but it's kids being kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage everywhere, cabinets wet and ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole setup screams impending accident.
segments.speaker: PAR
